name: Finger Derpy
description:
RACE your horse with your DERPY fingers!
* Tap or Hold 2 fingers on your keyboard: Like running little hooves!
* Always a New Course: Levels are procedurally generated as you run! Highways, dirt tracks, tobacco fields, snowy paths, and more!
* Dodge'Em Up: Avoid barrels, spotlights, turtles, cars, drums, pendulums, bikers, police, and even pinball paddles!
* Unlock New Breeds: Each breed has its own special power such as Smash and Time-Slow!
* Upgrade Your Steed: Find Gold Roses and get Permanent Upgrades for your horse!
* Horses and More: Unlock alligators, turkeys, polar bears -- oh my!
* Customize: Pick your ridiculous horse names, jersey silk styles and colors!

Escape the Finish Line!


Pick Your Racer!


Every Animal Has a Special Power!

Now Let's Get Derpy!
